name: Mime Jr.

evolution.description: Mime Jr. can evolve into Mr. Mime at the time 'Mimic' is learned. If in a region of typically cool climate (DM discretion), Mime Jr. evolves into Galarian Mr. Mime instead. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

conditions.value: in a region of typically cool climate

description: The Mime Pokémon. It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sound-based moves.

abilities.name: Filter
abilities.description: When hit by a move type this Pokémon is vulnerable to, it may roll a d4. In a result of 4, it does not take the additional damage.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.
